titles.title: A bill to prohibit the obligation or expenditure of funds for the Osprey tiltrotor aircraft.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Prohibits, with a specified exception, the obligation or expenditure of funds for the V-22 or CV-22 Osprey tiltrotor aircraft program. Repeals a provision of the John Warner National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2007 granting multiyear procurement authority for the V-22 tiltrotor aircraft program.
